reviewText: Awesome instructional DVD!  A must for all Giglio people!
This is Louie Giglio and Passion at its best - - with succinct, affirming messages.  I have bought several of these to share with others and highly recommend it.
Great DVD - four excellent talks including an interview with Matt Redmond.  Good for all ages - especially young people and those who struggle with seeing God as a loving perfect Father
Invited some friends over to watch it with me.
i got this for some kids at church who do not have a dad in the house  they liked it,  it made them not feel so abandoned.

WOW does Louie Giglio cover it all. This is so wonderful and what a great family tree we truly have and in this DVD you will find you have
not one, but two family trees. A blessed set of messages.
Amazing lessons.  Helped heal my view of God as a father due to a bad earthly father.  Highly recommend this video

Seeing God As A Perfect Father DVD was just what I and many others need to see and hear.  Louie Giglio has a God given talent to teach God's Word in a way that is not preachy.  He uses humor while maintaining Scriptural integrity..  The words father or dad do not always mean loving or caring.  This DVD makes it possible to see Father God as the perfect loving Father.  I am enjoying my Father and daughter relationship and am drawing closer to Him moment by moment.
